title: AI Practical Competency Strengthening: Workshop Integrating Instructional Designers’ Guessing Strategies and Reflective Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can solve problems by applying three or more inferential strategies in real-world science education design scenarios.
Learners can explain methods for managing uncertainty in the design process through reflective practice (Reflection-in-action).
Learners can revise and improve science education design proposals at least twice based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
